details: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to import features can execute arbitrary code via crafted configuration archive file upload.
